languages.text: {n}Мужчина склоняется в глубоком поклоне, исполненном почтения к словам {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}бывш{mf|его|ей} служител{mf|я|ьницы} Министорума{/d}.{/n} "Да не оскудеет Движущая сила в членах твоих, что служат Ему во благо. Приветствую, {mf|брат|сестра}".

{n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина склоняется в глубоком поклоне, исполненном почтения к словам {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}бывш{mf|его|ей} служител{mf|я|ьницы} Министорума{/d}.{/n} "Да не оскудеет Движущая сила в членах твоих, что служат Ему во благо. Приветствую, {mf|брат|сестра}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

{n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."
{n}The man offers you a deep bow of respect.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."
{n}The man offers you a deep bow of respect.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."
{n}The man offers you a deep bow of respect.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

{n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

{n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

languages.text: {n}Der Mann verbeugt sich voller Respekt vor den Worten eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}ehemaligen Mitglieds des Adeptus Ministorum{/d}.{/n} "Möge die Antriebskraft in Euren rechtschaffenen Gliedmaßen für Seine heiligen Dienste niemals versagen. Ich grüße Euch, {mf|Bruder|Schwester}."
languages.original_text: {n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann verbeugt sich tief und respektvoll vor dir.{/n} "Möge die Antriebskraft in Euren rechtschaffenen Gliedmaßen für Seine heiligen Dienste niemals versagen. Ich grüße Euch, {mf|Bruder|Schwester}."

languages.text: {n}L'homme s'incline pour faire montre du respect dû à {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}{mf|un ancien|une ancienne} membre de l'Adeptus Ministorum{/d}.{/n} « Puissent vos justes membres toujours compter sur la Force Motrice qui les anime en Son saint service. Je vous salue également, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme s'incline pour faire montre du respect dû à {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}{mf|un ancien|une ancienne} membre de l'Adeptus Ministorum{/d}.{/n} « Puissent vos justes membres toujours compter sur la Force Motrice qui les anime en Son saint service. Je vous salue également, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur}. »

languages.text: {n}这个人对你深深鞠了一躬，对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}国教教会前任神职人员{/d}道出了满怀敬意的话语。{/n}“愿神圣的源力流经您正义的躯体，愿祂的力量永不枯竭。我向您致以诚挚的问候，{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人对你深深鞠了一躬，表示敬意。{/n}“愿神圣的原初动力流经你正义的肢体，愿祂的力量永不枯竭。我向您致以诚挚的问候，{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。”

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}かつての帝国宗務局のしもべ{/d}が語った言葉に敬意を表しつつ、男は深く礼をする。{/n}「どうかあなたの手足の原動力が、あの方への聖なる奉仕の中で失敗することのありませんよう。ごきげんよう、{mf|兄弟|姉妹}」
languages.original_text: {n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は敬意をこめて深く礼をする。{/n}「どうかあなたの手足の原動力が、あの方への聖なる奉仕の中で失敗することのありませんよう。ごきげんよう、{mf|兄弟|姉妹}」

languages.text: {n}El hombre te ofrece una profunda reverencia como muestra de respeto a las palabras de un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}antigu{mf|o|a} sirviente del Adeptus Ministorum{/d}.{/n} «Que la Fuerza Motriz que l{mf|o|a} mueve con rectitud nunca falle en Su santo servicio. Le devuelvo el saludo, {mf|hermano|hermana}».
languages.original_text: {n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre te ofrece una profunda reverencia como muestra de respeto.{/n} «Que la Fuerza Motriz que lo mueve con rectitud nunca falle en Su santo servicio. Le devuelvo el saludo, {mf|hermano|hermana}».

languages.text: {n}Adam, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}eski bir Adeptus Ministorum hizmetkârının{/d} sözlerine saygı göstererek yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Erdem dolu uzuvlarındaki Devinim Gücü, O'nun ilahi hizmetindeyken seni asla yarı yolda bırakmasın. İçten selamlarımı sunarım kardeşim."
languages.original_text: {n}The man offers you a deep bow, respectful of the words spoken by a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former Adeptus Ministorum servant{/d}.{/n} "May the Motive Force in your righteous limbs never fail in His holy service. I greet you in kind, {mf|brother|sister}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}eski bir Adeptus Ministorum hizmetkârının{/d} sözlerine saygı göstererek yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Erdem dolu uzuvlarındaki Devinim Gücü, O'nun ilahi hizmetindeyken seni asla yarı yolda bırakmasın. İçten selamlarımı sunarım kardeşim."
